# Workshop Resources

## Software Tools

-   [QIIME2](https://qiime2.org/) - Microbiome analysis platform
-   [Phyloseq](https://joey711.github.io/phyloseq/) - R package for microbiome analysis
-   [mothur](https://mothur.org/) - Software for microbiome analysis

## Datasets

-   Workshop sample data (will be provided during the sessions)
-   [Earth Microbiome Project](https://earthmicrobiome.org/data/) - Reference datasets
-   [Human Microbiome Project](https://hmpdacc.org/) - Human microbiome reference data

## Additional Learning Resources

-   [Microbiome Analysis Tutorial Collection](https://microbiome.github.io/tutorials/)
-   [Happy Belly Bioinformatics](https://astrobiomike.github.io/)
-   [Bioconductor Workflows](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/workflows/)
